flawed_nl_solution:
If Kimiko is 26 years old, Kayla, who is half her age, is 26/2 = <<26/2=13>>13 years old.
Sine the minimum driving age is 18, Kayla will have to wait for 18-13 = <<18-13=2>>2 more years to start driving.
